summary: AN ORDINANCE related to taxicabs; revising the requirements for a demonstration project to determine the feasibility of wheelchair accessible taxicabs; specifying requirements for installation of digital security cameras in all taxicabs; and amending Seattle Municipal Code Sections 6.310.110, 6.310.320, 6.310.330, 6.310.455, 6.310.500, and 6.310.600.
